title: Embroidered Picture, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, metal wire, metal-wrapped silk, and silk-wrapped metal embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in running and interlaced looping, tent, half cross, and couching stitches on plain weave foundation
description: Fruiting tree with lion at the bottom and bird in the branches. Trunk of the tree is raised. Original picture was probably larger.

tombstone.epitaph:
Embroidered Picture, 17th century.
17th century. Medium: silk, metal wire, metal-wrapped silk, and silk-wrapped metal embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in running and interlaced looping, tent, half cross, and couching stitches on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Gertrude M. Oppenheimer. 1981-28-161.
